response.overview: Mikail lost his memory due to the trauma of a murder he was involved in the past. With a sens of guilt, he doesn't understand, he tries to find out who he is, who he might have killed, with the things he stole from the houses. Each item illuminates an event from his past. As Mikail traces his past in the dark houses of Istanbul he will have to come terms with his resentful gypsy childhood, his youth as a clarinetist who always wants to be approved, and his ambitious character who never head his wife's cries for help.
response.title: Blurry Blue
